text: A large flow of investments in companies and productive projects is made with the participation of venture capital and private equity funds; same ones that we help to structure, we accompany them in their various investments and disinvestments and we support them with advice for compliance with the various tax obligations to which they are subject. As part of our support when investing, we support them by carrying out an express due diligence that has the purpose of being able to identify, in a short term, in a general way, if the target company has a tax contingency that will prevent carrying out the investment. Subsequently, we support them in carrying out an in-depth tax due diligence that confirms the amount of the contingencies detected in the express due diligence and identifies and calculates those that had not been identified.
